Post_Title: My beloved PS4 controller died on me after hundreds of hours of gaming. Decided to frame it. You will be missed. [image]

Threads.Reply_Text: If this is all you have going for you in life, I feel bad for you.

Replies.Reply_Text: Oh fuck off. Know the guy personally do you.
Man, you're defensive.  Did I strike a nerve?  If you get mad over a little comment like this, maybe you should reevaluate your sad life as well.

Well ive got a black eye right now so i would argue im not defense enough. As for having a sad life, not really,my kids have grown up into really good people so im pretty proud of them, really happy that their happy. I wasnt mad either, just bored with the usual keyboard warrior shite from somebody who makes worthless comments. You have a good night though because after your pretty rude posts you must have had a shitty day. Oh and you didnt strike a nerve either because you dont know me. I could give you some pointers if you want to vent though. Just let me know kid ok.

Fuck i couldn't be more calm, im horizontal and petting my cat. Millennial lol, keep them coming son, ive always had a soft spot for cheeky kids lol. Ah you the cats moved now. Im holding you responsible for that. Anyway i would love to talk more but my gf will be home in a minute and were away to watch IT part 2.  Heard its pretty good, take care son. And genuinely if you ever want some advice from an old man, let me know. No hard feelings, lifes to short.
